com.gwtplatform.dispatch.server.spring.annotation

Annotation Type RegisterActionHandler

  • Deprecated. 
    Please use RegisterActionHandler.

    @Deprecated
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface RegisterActionHandler
    Annotation to put on handler to automatic register handler with action ActionHandler.getActionType() and validator validator().

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Class<? extends ActionValidator> validator
      Deprecated. 
      Validator type for action validation.

    • Element Detail

      • validator

        public abstract Class<? extends ActionValidator> validator
        Deprecated. 
        Validator type for action validation.
        Default:
        com.gwtplatform.dispatch.server.spring.actionvalidator.DefaultActionValidator.class
